mapper.insert: insert into mf_tprk(lsh, lrid, lrusername, truename, status, lrsj, cksj, fcsj, sdsj, driver_code, path_code,dept_code,store_code) select lsh, lrid, lrusername, truename, 2, lrsj, cksj, fcsj, sdsj, driver_code, path_code,dept_code,store_code from mf_tp where lsh=#{lsh}
insert into mf_tprk_mx(lsh,ddh,status) select lsh,ddh,status from mf_tp_mx where lsh=#{lsh} and status=1
mapper.update: update mf_tprk set status = 3 where lsh=#{lsh} and status=2
mapper.select: select lsh,a.lrid,a.driver_code as driverCode,b.driver_name as driverName, lrusername, a.truename, a.path_code as pathCode,c.path_name as pathName, a.lrsj,a.fcsj,a.sdsj,a.status,d.store_name as storeName, case a.status when 2 then '待入库' when 3 then '已入库' end as statusInfo from mf_tprk a left join mf_driver b on a.driver_code = b.driver_code left join mf_path c on a.path_code = c.path_code left join mf_store d on a.store_code = d.store_code inner join mf_user e on a.store_code = e.storage_code where e.id=#{uid} and a.status = 2 order by a.lsh desc
